remarks: Membership in a topology generated by a basis.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
eltg2b $p |- ( B e. V -> ( A e. ( topGen ` B ) <-> A. x e. A E. y e. B ( x e. y /\ y C_ A ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
